com.lavanya.escalade.controller

Class SiteMainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.escalade.controller.SiteMainController

  • @Controller
public class SiteMainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in MVC architecture to control all the requests related to Site object.
    Author:
    lavanya

    • Method Detail

      • showSiteForm

        @GetMapping(value="/createSite")
public java.lang.String showSiteForm(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                       MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /createSite endpoint. This controller-method creates a new object Site and pass it to the form for the user to create a Site with all its attributes.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails
        Returns:
        addSite.html

      • saveSite

        @PostMapping(value="/saveSite")
public java.lang.String saveSite(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="site")
                                                                  @Valid Site site,
                                                                  org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        POST request to send data to /saveSite endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to save a Site in database
        Parameters:
        site - is the object Site that needs to be saved.
        result - represents binding results, registers errors and allows for a Validator to be applied
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        site.html

      • showListOfSitesOfUser

        @GetMapping(value="/user/sites")
public java.lang.String showListOfSitesOfUser(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                                MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /user/sites endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all sites created by the authenticated user and pass that list to the view "userSites.html"
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails
        Returns:
        userSites.html

      • showSitesListByPage

        @GetMapping(value="/sites")
public java.lang.String showSitesListByPage(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                         MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                         @RequestParam(value="pageNumber")
                                                                         int currentPage,
                                                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /sitesList endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all sites created by all users and pass that list to the view "sitesList.html"
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        currentPage, - an int to specify which page of Sites to be displayed.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails
        Returns:
        sitesList.html

      • getSite

        @GetMapping(value="/site/{id}")
public java.lang.String getSite(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                 int siteId,
                                                                 Site site,
                                                                 @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                 MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /site/{id} endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all data related to a Site of interest and the Comments/Areas/Topos associated to that Site. Those data are then passed to the model and displayed in the view "site.html".
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        siteId - an int to specify the id of the Site object to be displayed.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails
        site - the object Site to be displayed in the view.
        Returns:
        site.html

      • displayComment

        @GetMapping(value="/site/{id}/updateComment/{commentId}")
public java.lang.String displayComment(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                  int siteId,
                                                                                                  @PathVariable(name="commentId")
                                                                                                  int commentId,
                                                                                                  Site site,
                                                                                                  @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                                                  MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /site/{id}/updateComment/{commentId} endpoint. This controller-method retrieves the same data than the previous method, getSite() and pass them again to the view "site.html". It will also retrieve from database an object Comment for update purpose.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        siteId - an int to specify the id of the Site object to be displayed.
        commentId - an int to specify the id of the Comment object to update.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails
        site - object Site to be displayed in the view.
        Returns:
        site.html

      • showNextPagesOfSitesToVisitors

        @GetMapping(value="/showSites/{pageNumber}")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView showNextPagesOfSitesToVisitors(@PathVariable(value="pageNumber")
                                                                                                                                 int currentPage,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(name="keyword",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String keyword,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(name="department",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String department,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(name="areasNumber",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer areasNumber,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(name="routesNumber",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer routesNumber,
                                                                                                                                 @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                                                                                 MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /showSites/{pageNumber} endpoint. This controller-method retrieves all sites created by all users and display them as Page to the view "sitesListForVisitors.html".
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        currentPage - an int to specify which page of Sites to be displayed.
        keyword - a String attribute from Search object used to filter a search sites by keyword.
        department - a String attribute from Search object used to filter a search sites by department.
        areasNumber - an Integer attribute from Search object used to filter a search sites by areasNumber.
        routesNumber - an Integer attribute from Search object used to filter a search sites by routesNumber.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails
        Returns:
        a model and view mav with view page as "sitesListForVisitors.html".

      • getTagOnSite

        @PostMapping(value="/addTag")
public java.lang.String getTagOnSite(@ModelAttribute(value="site")
                                                                    Site site,
                                                                    @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                    MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                    int currentPage,
                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        POST request to send data to /addTag endpoint. This controller-method the attribute tagged of Site in order to tag or not a site.
        Parameters:
        site - is the object Site that needs to be updated.
        currentPage, - an int to specify which page of Sites to be displayed.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        the end point /sites
